channel.title: OVN, Open Virtual Network on OVN project documentation website
channel.description: Recent content in OVN, Open Virtual Network on OVN project documentation website

item.description: OVN 24.03 OVN 24.03 was initially released on 1 March, 2024. This version of OVN is currently supported for all bug fixes. This version will enter critical fix mode on 1 March, 2026. Support for this version will end on 1 March, 2027. v24.03.3 v24.03.3 was released on 16 August, 2024. Github link Release Notes: OVN v24.03.3 - 16 Aug 2024 -------------------------- - Bug fixes Changelog v24.03.2 v24.03.2 was released on 10 May, 2024.

OVN 23.09 OVN 23.09 was initially released on 15 September, 2023. This version of OVN is currently supported for all bug fixes. Support for this version will end on 15 September, 2024. v23.09.5 v23.09.5 was released on 16 August, 2024. Github link Release Notes: OVN v23.09.5 - 16 Aug 2024 -------------------------- - Bug fixes Changelog v23.09.4 v23.09.4 was released on 10 May, 2024. Github link Release Notes: OVN v23.09.4 - 09 May 2024 -------------------------- - Bug fixes Changelog

OVN 22.03 OVN 22.03 was initially released on 11 March, 2022. This version of OVN is currently supported for critical and security fixes only. Support will end on 11 March, 2025. v22.03.7 v22.03.7 was released on 12 March, 2024. Github link Release Notes: OVN v22.03.7 - 12 Mar 2024 -------------------------- - Bug fixes - Security: Fixed vulnerability CVE-2024-2182. Changelog v22.03.6 v22.03.6 was released on 1 March, 2024. Github link Release Notes:

item.title: All Releases
item.description: Supported Releases The following OVN release series are still receiving upstream support. OVN 24.03 For more details, see 24.03 OVN 23.09 For more details, see 23.09 OVN 22.03 For more details, see 22.03 No Longer Supported Releases The following OVN release series are no longer supported. This means that they will not receive any future bug fixes, including critical or security fixes. It is not recommended to use these unless you absolutely must.
